title: GROUND FLOOR LOFT BDRM STUDIO WITH RADIANT HEAT!
posting_body: ['CLICK HERE FOR A VIDEO TOUR;', '<URL>', 'DIMENSIONS', 'Living Room 11\'9" L x 8\'9" W', 'Loft Bed Area 10\'8 L x 9\'3" W x 4\'2" H', 'This unit in a charming, south-facing (sunny)1920’s Marina style building, on a newly completed, magnolia tree-lined sidewalk.', 'This recently constructed, split-level unit has its own private entrance, and has newer, contemporary appliances, carpeted loft area for sleeping and storage, modern new kitchen and bath, plenty of cabinet space, with granite counters, large shower with slate flooring, recently replaced plumbing and electrical systems, as well as all-LED light fixtures on dimmers, stainless steel appliances, including a 5-burner stove and large microwave, double-pane windows, hardwood floors, with a RADIANT HEATING  THROUGHOUT, included!', "This unit is in a fantastic walking location, and is steps from USF, Saint Mary's Hospital and Golden Gate Park, and just blocks away from the Haight Ashbury District.", 'One block from Fulton or Hayes bus lines.', 'Newer on-site washer/dryers in building.', 'The building is rent-controlled and  underwent a complete seismic retrofit as required by the city of San Francisco.', 'Cat or bonded pair, OK!', 'Small dog considered.', 'CALL WILLIAM,', 'show contact info', '.']
